title: MotionCaptureSalsaPack01
description: 20 salsa dance recordings by expert instructors, beginner/intermediate
longDescription:
Infuse your Unreal Engine projects with the vibrant energy of salsa dancing using our motion capture data package. Featuring 20 recordings of beginner and intermediate salsa steps, these movements are performed by two expert instructors, ensuring authenticity and fluidity.

The data is rigged to the Unreal Manny and Quin, with minor hand positioning adjustments due to proportional differences. This does not impact the overall quality, making it ideal for retargeting to fit your own characters.

Whether for a game, animation, or VR experience, this collection adds authentic salsa flair to your creations. Enjoy smooth, realistic motion capture that brings the passion and rhythm of salsa to life in your projects."


Video preview:

https://youtu.be/RaPjMpQE8nQ



Music used during recondings(for speed/timing):

Me Hace Dano Verte, Fresto Music


Included recordings:

Beginners2_butterfly

Beginners2_Sombrero

Beginners4_scarf

Intermediate_freestyle
